name: Binary BitPath
description:
READ THIS To guarantee your game saving, use the downloaded version Click the buttons on the right side to try to make the blue and purple rows match. Keyboard keys around WASD supported (the positions of the buttons on screen correspond to the keyboard keys. i.e. the "<" operation is A, ">" is D, etc) Spoilers for what each button does
  • < shifts the blue row left
  • > shifts the blue row right
  • And - lights up spots that are in common between blue and red
  • Or - lights up spots that are lit in either blue or red
  • Xor - lights up spots that are lit in ONLY ONE of the blue or red rows. Spots lit in both become unlit
  • Not - Inverts the blue row
Join the discord for help, updates and new games: discord.gg/MM4Jm24wjR If the game does not load, try a different browser (firefox works best for me) or get the download

PAYING IS OPTIONAL, but appreciated :)
